attributes.action: No to another referendum for our EU membership the people have spoken we are OUT
attributes.additional_details: There should be no more negotiations with the EU over membership. The result was fair and definitive that the majority of the British public want to leave the European Union. This action should now be carried out in speedy and professional manner and without prejudice for the benefit of the United Kingdom and its future.
attributes.background: The referendum held on the 23 of June 2016 was to see if the people of Britain wanted to "Remain" or Leave" the European Union. The result was 52% to Leave and 48% Remain. We do not need any further votes or referendums on this matter. The result was "Leave" and it should stand as final.
